plot: Gabriella is a little girl who's a pirate sailing around the world to each of the five oceans on her pirate ship with her parrot, dog, and a boy and girl as passengers. She points out facts about each of the oceans in this 3d animation.
title: Pirate Gabriella Sails the Five Oceans
plot_es: Gabriella is a little girl who's a pirate sailing around the world to each of the five oceans on her pirate ship with her parrot, dog, and a boy and girl as passengers. She points out facts about each of the oceans in this 3d animation.
original_name: Pirate Gabriella Sails the Five Oceans
